name: Minimal 2048
description:
This was my entry for March's #1Gam game jam. 

Made over the space of a weekend, I just wanted to create a simple and clean take on one of my favourite mobile puzzle games, Metro 2048. One thing I tend to find when finding a good version to play is they tend to be very visually busy or just tiles with numbers which is why I've tried to create a minimal clean aesthetic by using only colours. 

Controls

Move Tiles -Arrows / LMB + Drag the direction you want the tiles to move.

Aim of the game

Push two matching coloured tiles together to upgrade them. Keep doing this until you create the ultimate tile!! Or at least until you run out of moves to make.

Credits

Programming, Art & Animation: Rob Brooks
